content: crochet a cute **mini christmas stocking** ornament for your christmas tree *this pattern is written in us terms* **materials** 3 0 mm 11 uk crochet hook sport 2 fine or dk 3 light yarn tapestry needle **yarn** i used schechenmayr catania or paintbox yarns cotton dk both yarns are 137 yds / 125 m per 50 g balls in the following colors **a** red **b** green **c** white **size** 2 8 7 cm by 1 2 3 cm **gauge** this pattern is too small to accurately determine the gauge **copyright** please remember that this pattern and the pictures shown here are property of raffamusadesigns com feel free to use the patterns to make and sell your finished products but you are not allowed to republish or distribute this pattern or parts of this pattern in any way please do not use photos from raffamusa designs in your listings **follow me** **blog** https //raffamusadesigns com/ **youtube** https //www youtube com/channel/uczqyp_l6lj8_ic3fcq30wjg **facebook** https //www facebook com/raffamusadesigns **instagram** https //www instagram com/raffamusa_designs/ **pinterest** https //www pinterest it/raffamusadesigns/_created/ **ravelry** https //www ravelry com/designers/raffaella-tassoni
